channel.title: csv2table on Sorin Chiorean
channel.description: Recent content in csv2table on Sorin Chiorean

item.title: csv2table - a fast and flexible CSV import tool
item.description: csv2table Github A fast and flexible command line tool to automate parsing and importing of CSV files into database tables. Currently it only supports MySQL. A relevant use case is the nightly import into a database of a CSV file, with a twist: some of the columns need special parsing. Consider the following CSV file No ID;Reading;Reading_Date;Channel 1;2,5;02.05.2014;X 2;2,5;02.05.2014;X 3;2,5;02.05.2014;First 4;2,5;02.05.2014;X 5;2,5;02.05.2014;Last 6;2,5;07.05.2014;X 7;2,5;17.07.2014;X 8;2,5;23.07.2014;X 9;2,5;28.07.2014;X 10;2,5;17.03.2015;X 11;2,5;01.02.2016; column no_id needs an index because we use inside “where” and “order by” sql clauses column reading_date needs to be imported as “date” sql column but is formatted as “dd.
